sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchAllStudentWorksheets } from "../services/worksheetServices" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" export const StudentHome = ({ user }) => { const [studentWorksheets, setStudentWorksheets] = useState([]) const handleStudentWorksheetFetch = () => { fetchAllStudentWorksheets().then((data) => { const filteredData = data.filter((datum) => datum.studentId === user.studentId * 1 && datum.isApproved !== true) setStudentWorksheets(filteredData) }) } useEffect(() => { handleStudentWorksheetFetch() }, [user.studentId]) return (

Welcome {user.firstName} {user.lastName}

{user?.aboutMe}

{studentWorksheets.length} worksheets to complete
Click on the icon to select a worksheet.
No spam
Officia excepteur ullamco ut sint duis proident non adipisicing. Voluptate incididunt anim.
) }
